sourceDesc.bibl: Margaret Sanger Papers, Sophia Smith Collection
Margaret Sanger Microfilm, Smith College Collections S73:83

headNote.p: No final version was found. This may be part of a longer document. The draft was likely written in the 1930s.

docBody.head: HEALTH
docBody.p: The health & well being of more than 45 million women of child bearing age of which 35 million are engaged in that precarious occupation of child bearing & on whom the lives of their children & the health & happiness of the family depend should be of paramount concern to these officials entrusted with the health & welfare of the Nation.
It should be the object of our Public Health to protect & improve the health & well being of this group upon whom the future of our National Citizenship depends.
From what Stock are we now storing for our future population?
